Description: Papyrus; Demotic legal text recto. Part of a series of papyri (EA 10618-39) recording dedications made by individuals of themselves and their children to a god.
Curator's comments: To be published by Tait and Ryholt. See Also: H. Thompson, JEA 26 (1940), pp. 68-78. J. Tait, Acta Demotica (Pisa, 1994) = EVO 17, p. 281.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381127) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381127)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bloom, displaced fragments, insect attack, fractured, discoloured Black ink Tabbed: silk Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
